title: [Medicine] New study shows fewer people die from covid-19 in better vaccinated communities. The findings, based on data across 2,558 counties in 48 US states, show that counties with high vaccine coverage had a more than 80% reduction in death rates compared with largely unvaccinated counties.

[Medicine] COVID-19 Can Infect and Damage Human Kidney Cells. SARS-CoV-2 can infect kidney cells via multiple binding sites and hijack the cellâ€™s machinery to replicate, causing injury and COVID-19-associated kidney disease, according to a new study.
